content: Awe, come on guys, cut Obama some slack! If we don't talk to the other side, who do we talk to? Our friends? It is time for America to engage with all countries and all rulers. It is time, at long last, for the US to engage in diplomacy; it is time for use to talk with Castro and Chavez. We lose nothing by shaking hands and talking. We gain nothing by boycotts and disdain. We gain much by stretching out the hand of friendship. As the philosopher Erasmus observed many years ago, "In great things, it is enough to have tried". Let's try!

content: The American people don't buy the Conservative argument that interacting with Chavez and Castro shows weakness. To the contrary, it shows a president intelligent enough to get into the head of difficult people and turn them around to a better way of thinking. Good job Mr. President, you are the change American's have so sorely needed.

content: Awe, come on guys, cut Obama some slack! If we don't talk to the other side, who do we talk to? Our friends? It is time for America to engage with all countries and all rulers. It is time, at long last, for the US to engage in diplomacy; it is time for use to talk with Castro and Chavez. We lose nothing by shaking hands and talking. We gain nothing by boycotts and disdain. We gain much by stretching out the hand of friendship. As the philosopher Erasmus observed many years ago, "In great things, it is enough to have tried". Let's try!
